contentList.content: You gain a +3 bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.

Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance Checks.

You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

You have become a true thespian. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increases by [1], to a maximum of [2]. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for Deception and Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="MusicalInstrumentProficiency">Musical Instrument Proficiency</LSTag>.
Close Quarters Archery
Close Quarters Archery: Point-Blank
Close Quarters Archery: Movement

When you make ranged attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Whenever you make a ranged attack, you may move a short distance without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
When you make ranged attacks within melee range, the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> do not have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
If you move after making a ranged attack, you don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> from your target, and you can move an additional [1].
Close Quarters Archery: Movement
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1].
When you would take 5 or less damage, you instead take no damage.
Durable
This character is rather durable. Only a hit that deals at least [1] damage can damage it.

You gain Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects and on Saving Throws made to avoid or resist traps.

You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

Gain the Knock and Arcane Lock spells. You can cast these spells once per Short Rest, and they don't expend any spell slots when cast.
Dungeon Delver: Arcane Delving

You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Knock">Knock</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ArcaneLock">Arcane Lock</LSTag> once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> without expending any <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.
Your spells ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to two damage types of your choice. When you cast spells of either type, you cannot roll a 1.
Elemental Adept: Radiant
Spells you cast ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. In addition, when you deal Radiant damage with a spell, you cannot roll a [1].
Elemental Adept: Necrotic
Spells you cast ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. In addition, when you deal Necrotic damage with a spell, you cannot roll a [1].
Well Armored

You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armor, Medium Armor, and Heavy Armour.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Well Armored
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armor, Medium Armor, and Heavy Armour.
Light Armor Master

Your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Whenever you are hit by a melee attack while wearing Light Armor, you gain a Dodge Charge, which you can spend to cause an attack to miss, or to automatically succeed a Dexterity saving throw.
Light Armor Master: Dodge

Whenever you are hit by a melee attack while wearing Light Armor, you gain a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BEN_FRR_LAM_DODGE">Dodge Charge</LSTag>, which you can spend to cause an attack to miss, or to automatically succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> saving throw.
Dodge Charge
Spend this charge to cause an attack to miss, or to automatically succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> saving throw.
Dodge Charge

When you are about to be hit by an attack or fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> saving throw, spend a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BEN_FRR_LAM_DODGE">Dodge Charge</LSTag> to dodge the attack or succeed the saving throw.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Charisma.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Wisdom.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Wisdom.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Charisma.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Charisma.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag>, a Level 1 spell, and a Level 2 from the wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 and 2 spells once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 4 spells is Intelligence.

Your Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Whenever you take damage while wearing Heavy Armor, you gain a stack of Fortitude, reducing all damage.
Heavy Armor: Fortitude
Whenever you take damage while wearing heavy armor, you gain a stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BEN_FRR_HAM_FORTITUDE">Fortitude</LSTag>, reducing all damage.
Heavy Armor: Fortitude
Taking hits has made you more resilient, reducing all incoming damage.
